name: Mermaid Flesh
description:
Chiyoko, a young maid, is sent to bring a piece of mermaid flesh for her employer, so he may live forever. She's not expecting a mermaid to actually leave the lake and speak to her.

Depending on her choices, there's a lot she may not expect tonight...

--

Contains non-graphic violence, murder, the eating of flesh.

--

Music by Dean Cruden

Special Thanks to Ley Klussyn
